review: Wayyyyyy better than Apple TV! I was an Apple fan for years, I have Apple iPhone, iPod, TV. It wasn't until recently that I tried Amazon TV just for the heck of seeing what it is. I must say, this little box is beyond your wildest imagination. Forget about Netflix and their outdated movies, and Apple TV is technologically behind when compared to Amazon TV. I mean come on, the Amazon TV has a microphone so you can speak your selection instead of taking 6 hours to type something on a keyboard that's alphabetically, not like your computer keyboard. With Amazon TV, you can search a movie within seconds by just speaking into the remote, and if you got Amazon prime, chances are very high you'll find what your looking for! Loves, loves, loves this little box <3
author: Betty

review: I give this 5 stars because I have no comlaints. I did not use it. I did not even unbox it. I called Amazon Customer Support to ask if this device was compatible with Kodi. I was told by a tech person that it is not and that if I sideloaded Kodi the warranty would be nullified.That settled that, so, I returned it.If there are folks out there who have successfuly installed Kodi, please, I do not need to know about it. Do not bother me with comments about spreading misinformation. This is a true account of what Amazon Customer Support told me. If you don't like it, bother them, not me.I returned it and bought something else.
